mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NOTI.NOTICE_SEQ) AS rowNum , NOTI.NOTICE_SEQ AS noticeSeq , NOTI.COMP_SEQ AS compSeq , COMP.COMP_NM AS compNm , NOTI.TITLE AS title , NOTI.CONTENT AS content , NOTI.FIXED_TOP_YN AS fixedTopYn , NOTI.MAIN_TOP_YN AS mainTopYn , NOTI.VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt , NOTI.DEL_YN AS delYn , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , REG_USER.USER_NM AS regNm , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI.UPDT_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS updtDt , UPDT_USER.USER_NM AS updtNm , 'TB_NOTICE' AS fileRefTb , 'NOTICE_SEQ' AS fileRefCol FROM TB_NOTICE NOTI LEFT JOIN TB_COMPANY COMP ON NOTI.COMP_SEQ = COMP.COMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER REG_USER ON NOTI.REG_SEQ = REG_USER.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER UPDT_USER ON NOTI.UPDT_SEQ = UPDT_USER.USER_SEQ WHERE NOTI.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
